## getDeviceName() function

Returns name of the device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getDeviceName(): Promise<string>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<string>`

## Remarks

On Node.js platform, it returns `hostname` of the platform.
